Class NeuralNetwork

java.lang.Object
NeuralNetwork
public class NeuralNetwork extends Object
A fully connected Neural Network (Multilayer Perceptron). Contains a method to produce a GreenfootImage visualization. Supplementary material to the book: "Reinforcement Learning From Scratch: Understanding Current Approaches - with Examples in Java and Greenfoot" by Uwe Lorenz. https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-3-031-09030-1 Ausgabe auf Deutsch: https://link.springer.com/book/9783662683101 Licensing CC-BY-SA 4.0 Attribution - Sharing under the same conditions I have opened the license in the current version (non-commercial has been removed), for example to enable use in adult education centers, private educational institutions or commercial educational offers. Ich habe die Lizenz in der aktuellen Version geöffnet (nicht-kommerziell wurde entfernt), um bspw. die Nutzung der Software in Volkshochschulen, privaten Bildungseinrichtungen oder kommerziellen Bildungsangeboten zu ermöglichen. www.x-ai.eu github.com/sn-code-inside/Reinforcement-Learning
Version:
1.2 (14.11.2023)
Author:
Uwe Lorenz

    • createWeightsFromGenome

      public void createWeightsFromGenome(Genome genome)
      The neural network receives weights from the genome. That's why no learning rule like backpropagation is needed here.

    • calcNumberOfWeights

      public static int calcNumberOfWeights(int[] size_of_network_layers)
      Calculates the number of weights from the given layer sizes (fully connected).
      Parameters:
      size_of_network_layers - Array containing the size of the layers of th neural network. The first layer 0 is the input layer and the last one istthe output layer.

      height -
      disp_activations - Set true to display neuron activations live (see GlassPane).
